summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5876 for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77382 as amended by Ordinance No. 77493, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
